Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Silka Maytower Kuala Lumpur in Kuala Lumpur, you'll be minutes from Capital Square and St. John's Cathedral. This hotel is close to Merdeka Square and Petaling Street.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 179 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include concierge services and wedding services. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.

Dining
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Kuala Lumpur? This hotel has 283 square feet (25 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's restaurant, which serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Additional features include concierge services and wedding services. Guests can catch a ride to nearby destinations on the complimentary area shuttle.
Make yourself at home in one of the 179 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. High-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

With a stay at Silka Maytower Kuala Lumpur in Kuala Lumpur, you'll be minutes from Capital Square and St. John's Cathedral. This hotel is close to Merdeka Square and Petaling Street.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Capital Square - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
St. John's Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Bukit Nanas Forest Reserve - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Kuala Lumpur Tower - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
DBKL City Theatre - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Jamek Mosque - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Merdeka Square - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Maju Junction Mall - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Bank Negara Money Museum - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Sultan Abdul Samad Building - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kuala Lumpur City Gallery - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Central Market - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Open University of Malaysia - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Dayabumi Complex - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Petaling Street - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The nearest airports are:
Subang (SZB-Sultan Abdul Aziz Shah) - 15 km / 9.3 mi
Kuala Lumpur (KUL-Kuala Lumpur Intl.) - 44 km / 27.3 mi

The preferred airport for Silka Maytower Kuala Lumpur is Kuala Lumpur (KUL-Kuala Lumpur Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
